robocup.managers

Class MovementManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • robocup.managers.MovementManager

  • public class MovementManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class can change robots velocity and rotation velocity according to StrategyManager calls
    Author:
    alaa13212
